dynamic_line: Kyaaaah! ...Ah! S-sorry I startled you, I was sure you were one of them Demons...
Um... You're not a Demon yet, right? Right?!

responses.text: [Mutation Threshold] Calm down, I'm a human! ...Well, at least I used to be.
[Mutation Threshold] Too bad. I'm no longer a human.

dynamic_line: Thank goodness, I'm glad there are still decent people around...

responses.text: [Perception 7] I don't mean to be rude, but are you a human yourself? That tail...
It's very dangerous to stay here.  How about cooperating together?
Sorry, but I don't have time for talking.

dynamic_line: I dunno...  But the Demons just showed up out of the blue.  You do know about <the_cataclysm>, right?  Local students and teachers were told to evacuate, and we all gathered here.  And then...

responses.text: [Intelligence 9] You gathered for evacuation?  So that means Demons were not occupying the school to begin with?

dynamic_line: Yes... That's right.  We didn't see any Demons until later.  I remember seeing some strangers among the refugees.  Our principal had some acquaintances so I thought they were related...  Oh, I'm pretty sure it was them who started doing something really fishy in the courtyard!

Yes, I am a human!  And the tail...  Well, I was attacked...  B-But nothing else, I swear!  Well, they stole my first kiss...  But other than that, I'm still, um, pure in every sense!  I'm still a virgin after all!
Yup, you got it!  Let's hurry up and get out of here!
...Sorry, it's not like I don't trust you, but...  I'm still scared.

responses.text: I see, so be it then.
